snippet: The company was criticized after disclosure that it had financial ties to a group that argues for less concern about eating habits and more emphasis on exercise.
abstract: Coca-Cola announces it will begin disclosing its investments in scientific research and advocacy about impact sugary soft drinks have on public health and obesity; move follows criticism of company for its ties to Global Energy Balance Network, nonprofit advocacy group that contends people worry too much about what they eat and not enough about how much they exercise.
lead_paragraph: The company was criticized after disclosure that it had financial ties to a group that argues for less concern about eating habits and more emphasis on exercise.

headline.main: Coca-Cola to Disclose Its Spending on Research Into Soft Drinks and Health
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola Will Disclose Some Research Spending
